from pyspark.sql.functions import udf, col, lit, when, coalesce, concat, sum, avg, max, min, count, countDistinct, date_format, to_date, datediff, months_between, year, month,  hour, minute, second, expr, asc, desc

from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

try:
    logInfo("Starting HR Cost Centre dimension setup")
    
    # Get storage account 
    storage_account = mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')
    logInfo(f"Using storage account: {storage_account}")
    
    # Fix the path
    storage_account = storage_account.rstrip('/')
    delta_table_path = f"abfss://odw-curated@{storage_account}/saphr/pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre"
    logInfo(f"Delta table will be created at: {delta_table_path}")
    
    # Create/refresh view
    logInfo("Creating view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre")
    spark.sql("""
    CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre AS
    SELECT
        RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.CostCentreCode) AS dim_cost_centre_key,
        a.CostCentreCode,
        a.CostCentre
    FROM
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT 
            CASE WHEN CostCtr ='' THEN '-1' ELSE CostCtr END AS CostCentreCode,
            CASE WHEN CostCentre ='' THEN '-' ELSE CostCentre END AS CostCentre
        FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_sap_hr
    ) a
    """)
    logInfo("Successfully created view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre")
    
    # Drop the table if it exists
    logInfo("Dropping table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre if it exists")
    spark.sql("""
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre
    """)
    logInfo("Table dropped or did not exist")
    
    # Create table from view with specified location
    logInfo("Creating table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre from view with specified location")
    spark.sql(f"""
    CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre
    USING delta
    LOCATION '{delta_table_path}'
    AS SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre
    """)
    
    logInfo("HR Cost Centre dimension setup completed successfully")

except Exception as e:
    logError(f"Error in HR Cost Centre dimension setup: {str(e)}")
    logException(e)
    raise e
finally:
    logInfo("Flushing logs")
    flushLogging()
